pkgmetadata.longdescription: # mdk`mdk` is a cli helper for docker built at [Matician](https://matician.com/).## Prerequisites* Python (3)* pip (3)* Docker(ce)### About Docker versionsThough `mdk` itself does not require a specific Docker version, it is often used in conjection with Docker features from the 1.40 Docker API. This is only supported by Docker releases >= 19.## Installation```sh$ pip3 install --user mdk```Note: you must have the `mdk` executable in your `$PATH`. If you used the installation instructions above, the executable is in `~/.local/bin`.## UsageRun the `mdk` command after installation for a full list of commands. For help on individual commands, use `mdk COMMAND --help`.## FAQ### How do I add custom configuration to containers created by `mdk`?`mdk` automatically loads additional options from two files:* `ext.mdk.json` located in the same directory as `mdk.json`* `~/.config/mdk/mdk.json`
